replies.bodyText: I used cdp instead of cdp7xx to avoid the inconsistency found in cdh5xx plugin with inside cdh5x and cdh6x ; I think it could be confusing.
replies.author: Redwene

replies.bodyText:
Agree cdh5x plugin is named badly.
My bad I thought we had separate plugins for hdp2x and hdp3x which is not the case (only hdpx   so no major in plugin name). Separation is done at template level.
We could use cdpx in that case but as long as cdp will be only dynamic "x" will be useless so cdp name is ok for me. Sorry for the noise
replies.author: lbourgeois

timeline.bodyText: Those files should be committed similar to what is done for cdh5x plugin for example : https://github.com/Talend/tbd-studio-se/blob/master/main/plugins/org.talend.hadoop.distribution.cdh5x/.project
timeline.author: lbourgeois

replies.bodyText: Could you explain why, I always think  those files is related to my ide, not the plugin.
replies.author: Redwene

replies.bodyText: Yes those are ide related files so I agree they are not committed in standard java projects but here we are dealing with eclipse plugins so we are stuck with eclipse and it makes project / plugin import easier as it will be configured out of the box.
replies.author: lbourgeois
